text.section: In this section, "direct care staff" means an individual who is directly involved in the day-to-day education, training, habilitation, assistance, counseling, care, or attention of an individual with a developmental disability.

section.section: The Developmental Disabilities Administration shall assure that all direct care staff in State residential and community-based programs are provided with in-service training.

text.section: Each direct care staff member shall participate in the in-service training curriculum within 3 months from the date of the staff member's employment.
The Developmental Disabilities Administration shall develop standards for in-service training in accordance with recognized standards for direct care staff.
